what: Function to extract TFFF colors as hex codes — tfff_colors
title: Function to extract TFFF colors as hex codes — tfff_colors
text: tfff_colors() enables pull colors directly tfff palette. Choose one following options: `Dark Green`, `Light Green`, `Orange`, `Yellow`, `Blue`, `Red`, `Brown`, `Dark Gray`, `Medium Gray`, `Light Gray`.
